Description: The number of taxa across all samples. MappingCoverage = post mapping/pre mapping.

column1: Estimated total number of named taxa
Description: The estimated number of taxa following standard nomenclature. Estimated by excluding all taxa whose names contain "-" &/or multiple uppercase letters in a row.
Mean number of taxa across samples (equals to species richness on species taxonomic level). MappingCoverage = post mapping/pre mapping.
Mean alpha-diversity (calc. by pielous evenness) in samples. Towards 0: low diversity, towards 1: high diversity, with 1: complete evenness. MappingCoverage = post mapping - pre mapping.
Mean number of reads across samples. MappingCoverage = post mapping/pre mapping.
